title: Doggo Clicker

headings.text: Can I play Doggo Clicker on mobiles?

controls: Mouse click to earn bark coins and interact
Tap on the doggo to collect bark coins and interact with upgrades.
content.howToPlay: In Doggo Clicker, your main job is to click on your dog to improve their mood and earn coins.Use these coins to purchase fun accessories like eyeglasses, hats and even tiny little shoes for the cutest paws ever.Increase your coin per click (CPC) and coins per second (CPS) with upgrades on the right side. There are over 50 upgrades that you can buy one buy one or in bulk.When your dog reaches level 100, unlock Prestige, which resets some progress but boosts future earnings. Want to go further? Rebirth your dog and reset after earning massive amounts of coins for even more power.
content.developer: Doggo Clicker was developed by Denis Olenison.

fullContent: Homeâ€º ClickerDoggo ClickerBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenYour little puppy needs a cozy home, and guess what? You're the one to build a nice kennel! Doggo Clicker is a 2D idle game where you shower an adorable doggo with love as you click to boost his mood. It's all about collecting those bark coins. Use your coins to pamper your pet with new accessories like new hats, glasses, and shoes. Plus, you can design the perfect home for your furry friend. Doggo Clicker is an idle game that animal lovers have been waiting for since forever!ControlsComputersMouse click to earn bark coins and interactMobilesTap on the doggo to collect bark coins and interact with upgrades.How to Play Doggo ClickerIn Doggo Clicker, your main job is to click on your dog to improve their mood and earn coins.Use these coins to purchase fun accessories like eyeglasses, hats and even tiny little shoes for the cutest paws ever.Increase your coin per click (CPC) and coins per second (CPS) with upgrades on the right side. There are over 50 upgrades that you can buy one buy one or in bulk.When your dog reaches level 100, unlock Prestige, which resets some progress but boosts future earnings. Want to go further? Rebirth your dog and reset after earning massive amounts of coins for even more power.Build a KennelLil' pup deserves the perfect home. You'll make that happen with your hard-earned bark coins!To start building, simply click on the house icon located at the bottom right of your dog.From there, every time you click on the build icon, you will buy materials one by one.But, each purchase will make the next one more expensive. So you need to work hard.Begin by constructing walls to give your pup a safe space, then add a roof to keep them dry and cozy.Finish it off with a welcoming door to complete your kennel. Once you complete the dog house, you can change its look.Completing the dog house boosts your doggo's mood and improves your earnings even further.DeveloperDoggo Clicker was developed by Denis Olenison.Can I play Doggo Clicker on mobiles?Yes, you can play Doggo Clicker on mobiles, including iOS, Android, ChromeOS.More Games Like ThisIf you enjoy Doggo Clicker, try other fun idle games like Capybara Clicker Pro, where you unlock all kinds of cute little Capybaras!This article was updated on October 8, 20241 Player2DAnimalClickerCuteFreeHTML5IdleMobileMouse
